project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project would provide assistance for 900 existing and 5,400 new smallholder farmers to grow some 6,300 ha of maize and 5,000 ha of tobacco by development of 11.5 ha family farms and community infrastructure, establishment of tree nurseries for curing fuel and conservation purposes, provision of credit (seasonal and medium-term) and technical services for project management and extension.
